info.name: NoirWeb.
info.description:
Description:
NoirWeb is a premium Stylish theme that transforms your favorite websites into an elegant and modern dark mode. The color scheme features a dark gray background (#121212) with light gray text (#e0e0e0) for easy readability and a sophisticated look. Links are highlighted in a lavender color (#bb86fc), adding a romantic touch to the dark aesthetic. The header and footer are a deeper gray (#1f1f1f), ensuring a smooth and consistent appearance. Buttons have a dark gray background with light gray text for clear and effortless user interaction. Images and videos are slightly dimmed to provide a more seamless visual experience. NoirWeb is designed to give your websites a classy and stylish appearance, reducing eye strain and creating a unique and aesthetically pleasing environment.
